text: Schematic fabrication process for the dual-layer carbon film.
The processes were carried out in a silica tube furnace at 1000 Â°C.
The surface of SiC was converted into CDC by etching in a chlorine-containing gas mixture.
The shape of the sample stayed unchanged.
The CVD layer was prepared by pyrolyzing CCl4 on top surface of CDC layer and increased the sample thickness.
